channel.title: Logging in easy rsc
channel.description:
Hey kinda new to the whole development thing and was wondering how to log into the client as admin on easy rsc and also i want to work on making some of the quests and adding new content to the server... i would like to get some graphic designers to start designing some new kinds of armour and new items as well as adding to the maps, and mini games possibly... i have the landscape editor peter made but it doesn't work like i would want it too...
thanks, tim

just log in with any username and password…

item.title: Logging in easy rsc
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

i looked at the server panel and theres no names off to the right of it when i run server (no admin,no players) , but i dont seem to be able to find the place where u create your ingame account… i kno where “the players” is, located in the server folder (all there is a template file inside there) i know it seems dumb i just want to make an account, and theres no option to create an account ingame account on the client buttons when u load up the client screen…

Read full topic

item.title: Logging in easy rsc
item.dc:creator: @Artemis_Wp Artemis Wp
item.description:
@Artemis_Wp wrote:

Create ur ingame account, then go to SERVER FOLDER and here u have PLAYERS. Open PLAYERS folder and find ur name here. Open CGF file with Notepad or Notepad++ and find for this :
“rank=0” change this 0 to 4 like : “rank=4” then save and login back in game !

P.S : while u edit ur file, u must be logged off server.

Read full topic
